name: LITGRID AB
goal: Litgrid, Lithuanian electricity transmission system operator, maintains stable operation of the national power system, controls electricity flows, and enables competition in an open electricity market. Litgrid is responsible for integrating the national power system into the European power infrastructure and electricity market. While realising the goal of Lithuania‘s energy independence, we promote culture of responsibility, creativity and dialogue. The next startegic goal - intergration into Continental European network for synchronous operations.
interests: Communication, Energy, Environment, External Relations, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Litgrid takes active participation on topics and legal initiatives related with electricity network codes and guidelines, electricity market integration, synchronisation with the continental European grids, and international power links.
